name: 360 Aviation, LLC
about: 360 Aviation, LLC, located in Albert Lea, Minnesota (KAEL), offers comprehensive and accelerated flight training programs designed to cater to various learning paces. Our courses include private pilot, commercial pilot, and other certifications, all aimed at providing career advancement opportunities through practical and experiential training. With a team of experienced instructors, some of whom were part of Albert Lea's thriving aviation past, we ensure dedicated instruction and daily availability to maximize training opportunities. Our programs focus on safety, accuracy, and professionalism, preparing students for successful aviation careers. We also offer referral incentives and credits for new students. At 360 Aviation, our goal is to equip adults with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the aviation industry.
services:
